name: mcp-server-basic-memory
description: Local-first knowledge management combining Zettelkasten with knowledge graphs

rating.reason: Mixed quality documentation with adequate tool descriptions but inconsistent parameter documentation. While some tools like 'build_context' and 'sync_status' have excellent comprehensive descriptions, many tools have minimal parameter descriptions (e.g., 'identifier', 'project', 'content' lack context about expected formats or constraints). The toolset covers complex functionality but leaves users guessing about parameter usage patterns and constraints in most cases.
